title: 林鄭段錄音係故意流出 "Carrie Lam's recording was intentionally leaked"

replies.msg:
其實條片出咗街對佢利益多過弊處
佢本身唔可以／唔願意公開認輸退讓俾示威者，但係又急切地要為衝突降溫
唯一方法就係以個人名義刻意流出"閉門錄音"，將警隊，中共同港共政府嘅錯攬晒上身
企圖以一個人去暫時造出政府已經有意讓步嘅假象，等政府民望稍為上升
錄音裡面佢從頭都未都係係度讚警隊，讚中共係世界上有頭有面，同佢平時嘅口徑其實一模一樣，
佢可以扮喊扮弱小唔係第一日嘅事，之前打晒親情牌已經可以見到佢幾奸
亦佢絕對係會用依種卑鄙手段嘅賤人

簡單嚟講，
佢嘅錄音出咗之後都係冇嘢改變過，佢係絕對唔會落台，唔好俾佢呃咗，抗爭必須繼續
五大訴求，缺一不可
時代革命，光復香港

You may have heard of the recent "secret" recording where Carrie Lam claimed that she "would quit if given a coice" owing to the recent political upheavals, where the recording was supposedly leaked from a private conversation.
This is very likely a ploy that she has resorted to to defuse the current deadlock. She could not gain beijing's approval to back down, nor could she continue to let the situation continue to fester. Therefore, she came up with this cunning plan of trying to show weakness in a "moment of sincerity" hoping that protesters or the general public will be more lenient towards her.
In fact, her narratives of the police and the CCP, commending them as heroes and a nation worthy of protecting do not deviate from something that she would say on a day-to-day basis when facing the media in public, what has changed is that she finally conceded to making a grave mistake, in an attempt to show remorse when her support and ratings are at a historic low.
She has used similar tactics in the past before, exploiting her gender as a woman to feign weakness and cry crocodile tears, as well as abuse the narrative of "motherhood" and dub herself the "mother" of the city.

In short, NOTHING has changed, DON'T be deceived by her. Hong Kong people must remain ever vigilant and continue with the pursuit towards democracy and universal suffrage.

Fight for freedom, Stand with Hong Kong

You may have heard of the recent "secret" recording where Carrie Lam claimed that she "would quit if given a coice" owing to the recent political upheavals, where the recording was supposedly leaked from a private conversation.
This is very likely a ploy that she has resorted to to defuse the current deadlock. She could not gain beijing's approval to back down, nor could she continue to let the situation continue to fester. Therefore, she came up with this cunning plan of trying to show weakness in a "moment of sincerity" hoping that protesters or the general public will be more lenient towards her.
In fact, her narratives of the police and the CCP, commending them as heroes and a nation worthy of protecting do not deviate from something that she would say on a day-to-day basis when facing the media in public, what has changed is that she finally conceded to making a grave mistake, in an attempt to show remorse when her support and ratings are at a historic low.
She has used similar tactics in the past before, exploiting her gender as a woman to feign weakness and cry crocodile tears, as well as abuse the narrative of "motherhood" and dub herself the "mother" of the city.

In short, NOTHING has changed, DON'T be deceived by her. Hong Kong people must remain ever vigilant and continue with the pursuit towards democracy and universal suffrage.

Fight for freedom, Stand with Hong Kong

You may have heard of the recent "secret" recording where Carrie Lam claimed that she "would quit if given a coice" owing to the recent political upheavals, where the recording was supposedly leaked from a private conversation.
This is very likely a ploy that she has resorted to to defuse the current deadlock. She could not gain beijing's approval to back down, nor could she continue to let the situation continue to fester. Therefore, she came up with this cunning plan of trying to show weakness in a "moment of sincerity" hoping that protesters or the general public will be more lenient towards her.
In fact, her narratives of the police and the CCP, commending them as heroes and a nation worthy of protecting do not deviate from something that she would say on a day-to-day basis when facing the media in public, what has changed is that she finally conceded to making a grave mistake, in an attempt to show remorse when her support and ratings are at a historic low.
She has used similar tactics in the past before, exploiting her gender as a woman to feign weakness and cry crocodile tears, as well as abuse the narrative of "motherhood" and dub herself the "mother" of the city.

In short, NOTHING has changed, DON'T be deceived by her. Hong Kong people must remain ever vigilant and continue with the pursuit towards democracy and universal suffrage.

Fight for freedom, Stand with Hong Kong

You may have heard of the recent "secret" recording where Carrie Lam claimed that she "would quit if given a coice" owing to the recent political upheavals, where the recording was supposedly leaked from a private conversation.
This is very likely a ploy that she has resorted to to defuse the current deadlock. She could not gain beijing's approval to back down, nor could she continue to let the situation continue to fester. Therefore, she came up with this cunning plan of trying to show weakness in a "moment of sincerity" hoping that protesters or the general public will be more lenient towards her.
In fact, her narratives of the police and the CCP, commending them as heroes and a nation worthy of protecting do not deviate from something that she would say on a day-to-day basis when facing the media in public, what has changed is that she finally conceded to making a grave mistake, in an attempt to show remorse when her support and ratings are at a historic low.
She has used similar tactics in the past before, exploiting her gender as a woman to feign weakness and cry crocodile tears, as well as abuse the narrative of "motherhood" and dub herself the "mother" of the city.

In short, NOTHING has changed, DON'T be deceived by her. Hong Kong people must remain ever vigilant and continue with the pursuit towards democracy and universal suffrage.

Therefore, she came up with this cunning plan of trying to show weakness in a "moment of sincerity" hoping that protesters or the general public will be more lenient towards her.
In fact, her narratives of the police and the CCP, commending them as heroes and a nation worthy of protecting do not deviate from something that she would say on a day-to-day basis when facing the media in public, what has changed is that she finally conceded to making a grave mistake, in an attempt to show remorse when her support and ratings are at a historic low.
She has used similar tactics in the past before, exploiting her gender as a woman to feign weakness and cry crocodile tears, as well as abuse the narrative of "motherhood" and dub herself the "mother" of the city.

In short, NOTHING has changed, DON'T be deceived by her. Hong Kong people must remain ever vigilant and continue with the pursuit towards democracy and universal suffrage.

You may have heard of the recent "secret" recording where Carrie Lam claimed that she "would quit if given a coice" owing to the recent political upheavals, where the recording was supposedly leaked from a private conversation.
This is very likely a ploy that she has resorted to to defuse the current deadlock. She could not gain beijing's approval to back down, nor could she continue to let the situation continue to fester. Therefore, she came up with this cunning plan of trying to show weakness in a "moment of sincerity" hoping that protesters or the general public will be more lenient towards her.
In fact, her narratives of the police and the CCP, commending them as heroes and a nation worthy of protecting do not deviate from something that she would say on a day-to-day basis when facing the media in public, what has changed is that she finally conceded to making a grave mistake, in an attempt to show remorse when her support and ratings are at a historic low.
She has used similar tactics in the past before, exploiting her gender as a woman to feign weakness and cry crocodile tears, as well as abuse the narrative of "motherhood" and dub herself the "mother" of the city.

In short, NOTHING has changed, DON'T be deceived by her. Hong Kong people must remain ever vigilant and continue with the pursuit towards democracy and universal suffrage.

Fight for freedom, Stand with Hong Kong
